title: Introducing: Matt Hylom
content: Matt Hylom’s single I Won’t Forget, cropped up on my radar a couple of months back, as an addition to our rolling Spotify New Music playlist. Whilst initially I had a few reservations about the slightly cheesy nature to it, I found myself returning to it again and again – grabbed by the slick production and no frills songwriting. Now accompanied by a fittingly refined video, the ambition here is striking, and with a few more songs like this, there’s no limit how far Hylom could go. Check out I Won’t Forget below, lifted from his debut EP, My Own Anxieties, out now.
